original_text:
This is what the Lord says:
“The people who survive the sword
    will find favor in the wilderness;
    I will come to give rest to Israel.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시니라 칼에서 벗어난 백성이 광야에서 은혜를 입었나니 곧 내가 이스라엘로 안식을 얻게 하러 갈 때에라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
The people who survive the sword
will find favor in the wilderness;
I will come to give rest to Israel.
